mapper.insert:
insert into bureau_line_order
bureau_line_order.bureau_id,
bureau_line_order.line_id,
bureau_line_order.operator,
bureau_line_order.sort_num,
bureau_line_order.create_time
values
#{bureauId},
#{lineId},
#{operator},
#{sortNum},
current_timestamp
mapper.update:
update bureau_line_order
bureau_line_order.bureau_id = #{BureauId},
bureau_line_order.line_id = #{LineId},
bureau_line_order.operator = #{Operator},
bureau_line_order.sort_num = #{SortNum}
bureau_line_order.update_time= current_timestamp
bureau_line_order.id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select bureau_line_order.bureau_id, bureau_line_order.create_time, bureau_line_order.id, bureau_line_order.line_id, bureau_line_order.operator, bureau_line_order.sort_num, bureau_line_order.update_time form bureau_line_order
bureau_line_order.id = #{id}
